name: parserator
description: A parser combinator library inspired by Parsec and Effect-TS

scripts.publish:patch: bun run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: bun run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: bun run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: bun run build && bun test && bun run publish:patch
scripts.release:minor: bun run build && bun test && bun run publish:minor
scripts.release:major: bun run build && bun test && bun run publish:major

author: Sai (https://bsky.app/profile/texoport.in)
